name: Felton Institue Early Psychosis Services
description: Felton’s Early Psychosis Division is an award-winning leader in addressing the early signs of psychosis and bipolar disorder. The Felton (re)MIND® early psychosis program delivers comprehensive treatment grounded in wellness, recovery and resilience to people experiencing early signs and symptoms of a psychotic disorder, as well as providing families the tools to support their loved ones in their recovery process. Their mission is to transform the treatment and perception of psychosis – and by e
